wikipedia_page.main: Dick Oxtoby (born 5 September 1939) was an English footballer, who played as a centre half in the Football League for Bolton Wanderers and Tranmere Rovers.He died in June 2020 at the age of 80.

response: * 23 June 2020: Dick Oxtoby, 80, Bolton Wanderers and Tranmere Rovers defender.
*Dick Oxtoby, 80, English footballer (Tranmere Rovers, Bolton Wanderers, Runcorn), Lewy body dementia.Richard Oxtoby
